name: Foreign Frugglers (itch)
description:
The Fruggle is real!
Eight brave survivors need to protect mother earth from spacey invaders in this
pixelated arcade style 2d shoot 'm up.
Use different types of weapons to shoot those bastards, rack up your score, and don't get 'Fruggled'.

Features:
-Classic arcade mode
-Endless mode
-Retro color palettes
-CTR-filter and other screen effects
-Xbox controller support
-Local highscores & achievements

Designed and developed by ULTIMO.
